descriptionHtml:
[FONT=IMPACT][SIZE=8][COLOR=Slategray][CENTER]THE PACT OF PERYITE[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[FONT=IMPACT][SIZE=5][COLOR=Slategray][CENTER]SUPPORT THIS MOD BY HITTING ENDORSE![/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]

So this is an idea that i had for a mod and i\'ve been working on it, there are a lot of bugs at the moment and graphical / animation glitches but they will all be ironed out

Please provide me suggestions for the mod and ideas / feedback (constructive)

Please Read:

Remember to Save your game a lot, one scratch from the zombies can cause instant blood loss / fatality

Features-

The Eternal Mist:
Ever since the mist appeared the dead have walked and strange noises have been heard on the marshes, there is more than the dead that walks amongst the mist

Zombies:
2 current types of zombie, named Mistwalkers

[center][img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/newuploads/oatbv.gif[/img][/center]

The Mistbringers:
A large demonic force enveloped by the mist, this creature has been sighted around Whiterun and with it the mist has followed, these creatures are the bringers of the eternal mist

[center][img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/newuploads/eohdg.jpg[/img][/center]

New Dragons -

The Mistlurker Dragon:
The mist has brought more than just the horde, a dragon has been sighted amongst the mist, almost invisible to the naked eye.

[center][img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/newuploads/smh2v.jpg[/img][/center]

The Infection:
there is a 50% chance that a scratch from a Mistwalker will cause you to contract the infection which will cause major blood loss followed by a slow agonizing death. your life force will be used to regenerate the health of the zombie (this also goes for npcs)

Working on:

Armour rating effecting the chance of contracting the infection

Current Zombie Infested Areas:

Solitude, Whiterun, Riverwood, Riften, Dawnstar

Download from Steam Workshop:

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=136186881]Click Here[/url]

Keep up to date with new patches and mods @

[FONT=IMPACT][SIZE=4][CENTER][URL=http://www.YouTube.com/ColloseusXReturns]Follow my MOD Dev Blogs[/URL][/CENTER][/FONT][/SIZE]

[FONT=IMPACT][SIZE=6][COLOR=Slategray][CENTER]FROM THE CREATOR OF[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12476]COLLOSEUSX\'S TOY SOLDIERS[/URL][/CENTER]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12795]RETURN OF THE DWEMER[/URL][/CENTER]
